item.description:
Hey everyone,

Jonathan is feeling a little under the weather so instead of doing improv, I thought I'd see if people wanted to go play some pool at the Wave. It's free from 7-9 on Saturdays. So let's get through yet another COLD winter evening with some fun! Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one wearing clothes, but hopefully I won't be the only one! :-)
item.name: Free Pool @ the Wave
